title: Semi-Supervised Learning Algorithms
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of semi-supervised learning, which is a type of machine learning where some of the training data is labeled and some is unlabeled. Semi-supervised learning algorithms can leverage the unlabeled data to improve the model's performance and generalize better to new samples. This is particularly useful when we have a small amount of labeled data but a large amount of unlabeled data.

meta.title: Exploring Semi-Supervised Learning Algorithms
meta.description: Dive into the world of semi-supervised learning with this comprehensive guide on Self Training and Label Propagation algorithms.
meta.keywords: machine learning, semi supervised learning, self training, scikit-learn, label propagation, data science, scikit-learn playground

i18n.title: 半监督学习算法
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索半监督学习的概念，这是一种机器学习类型，其中一些训练数据是有标签的，而一些是无标签的。半监督学习算法可以利用无标签数据来提高模型的性能，并更好地泛化到新样本。当我们有少量有标签数据但大量无标签数据时，这特别有用。

meta.title: 探索半监督学习算法
meta.description: 通过这本关于自训练和标签传播算法的全面指南，深入了解半监督学习的世界。
meta.keywords: 机器学习, 半监督学习, 自训练, scikit-learn, 标签传播, 数据科学, scikit-learn 游乐场
